personalInfo.clubAffl: Hot Stix at Legend Trail GC (Scottsdale, Arizona)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 55th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Missed the cut in his only two previous PGA TOUR starts, at the 2004 and 2006 Chrysler Classics of Tucson.
tourBios.personal: Played at Desert Mountain High School in Scottsdale, Ariz...Was an AJGA All American...Did not play golf in college at Arizona State, where he graduated cum laude...Sister, Laura London, is a professional golfer and appeared on the Golf Channel's "Big Break VI."...Mother, Deanna, is a published, inspirational author for Blue Mountain Arts Worldwide...Instructors include Nick Beisser and Mark Williamson...Has five wins on the Gateway Tour, one win on the Dakota Tour and more than 15 wins on the Pepsi Tour...Biggest thrill in golf was Monday qualifying for his first PGA TOUR event, at age 22 in 2004...Enjoys bullriding, skydiving and yoga...Never travels without a yoga mat...Favorite college teams are the Arizona State Sun Devils and the Arkansas Razorbacks. Favorite pro teams are the Arizona professional teams, the Cardinals, Coyotes and Diamondbacks. Favorite TV shows are "Happy Endings" and "Modern Family." Favorite book is The Outsiders. Favorite cities to visit are San Francisco and Sierra Vista, Ariz. Favorite gadget is his iPad...Oldest club in bag is a TaylorMade 3-wood (four years)...Most people don't know that he is a bad speller...Charity involvement includes Locks of Love, breast cancer organizations and the Arizona Junoir Golf Association.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2012 is T35th at the Midwest Classic Presented by Cadillac.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T94th in Longest Drives on the Web.com Tour.
